name: Game project for Visuell Estetik - BTH
name_original: Game project for Visuell Estetik - BTH
description:
This game was made as part of a university course (Visuell Estetik) at BTH in 2018

In this game you will have to change camera-perspective back and forth (2D and 3D first person view)  and solve a puzzle 

keyboard buttons WASD and the Mouse are main controllers. 
Buttons "e" and "q" are used to interact with and pickup certain objects. unfortunately the screen instruction for those don't show up because of the project being incomplete for now. 

Created by:
Ahmad Al Shehabi (programming)
Leo Andersson (3D modelling)
Hubert Czekierda (Sprites and textures)
